content.rendered:
About Us

M.R. Samarth Educare was founded in 2017 by Mr. Dnayneshwar Mutkule, a Metallurgy and Material
Science engineer from College of Engineering Pune (COEP). After graduating from COEP, Dnyaneshwar sir joined Bharat Forge as a Graduate Engineer Trainee in 2015 in Baramati. He started teaching a few students in his vicinity. This was the inception of the ‘M.R. Samarth Educare’ as an Idea. By looking at the progress of these students more students joined in.

In 2017, the M.R. Samarth Educare got its current form, with a vision to curb the Information Asymmetry amongst students in Tier 2 and Tier 3 cities. The idea is to give students a Launch-pad who are
talented but lack the exposure and mentorship when it comes to competitive exams. High achievers from the prestigious institutes of our country don’t choose teaching as a profession because of the compensation disparity and lack of ownership given to them. M.R. Samarth Educare is working on
bridging this gap by collaborating with top performers from esteemed national institutes of the likes of IIT, COEP, NIT, IIM. Today many stalwarts from premium institutes have joined the cause of M.R. Samarth Educare.

The world is changing with technology and so is the way to education. We understand the need to change and hence, we are working on leveraging technology into our teaching pedagogy so as to provide the students best in class learning infrastructure. The results M.R. Samarth Educare has achieved so far across examples, like Olympiads, Talent Search exams and board exams talk about its
commitment in quality of the education we provide. Even though we have achieved so much in so little time, we believe there are MILES TO GO & MILES TO GO on the path of providing the relevant education for each student.

To Create a center of excellence for education to strive for student’s all round development.

M.R. Samarth Educare is established to support students to achieve their academic goals through personalized teachings that foster self regulated learning and enhance academic skills and create opportunities for leadership and continuous development.
